title: Did you present this picture of a boy who was forced to sleep on the floor of an English hospital?
subtitle: A wave of social media sites cast doubt in the minds of some about the validity of a story that proved to be a major moment in the 2019 general elections in the United Kingdom.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: A picture published in December 2019 showed a boy who had to sleep on the floor of a hospital in Leeds, England, because of overcrowding.
